titleStmt.title: Empsychon nekron, or, The lifelessness of life on the hether side of immortality with (a timely caveat against procrastination) briefly expressed and applyed in a sermon preached at the funerall of Edward Peyto of Chesterton ... / by Thomas Pierce ...
titleStmt.author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.

notesStmt.note: First two words of title in Greek characters.
Imperfect: pages faded with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
